title: Public Beta Environment (PBE)
body:
Sorry Right For saying that but I am new player I got to level 30 in my other account I know this game about 1 month and I saw my cousin and a lot of players register in the PBE after my research I found out that the PBE was activated from 2012 and in 2013 I think or 2014 it was closed (I Think Not Sure!)
so my main point is why the people who were in 2012 made it to the PBE while the new players in 2015  and 2016 closed.
when u will active the PBE??

replies.body: I'm not sure I clearly understand the timeline you provided here, but all players have to [apply for the PBE](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).   It's not really something you get grandfathered or expedited into.  We have a [PBE FAQ](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq) that I hope might shed more light on this.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hey I am the one who make this timeline I think?
But when I tried to apply it says there is something wrong or Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later. I get this massege about 2 weeks now every time I try nothing happens so please help me in this D: 
I wanna really TRY the PBE But I cant even apply for it.
